body:
## Using Bzlmod (Recommended)

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "depend_on_what_you_use", version = "0.9.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE (Legacy)

Add to your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "depend_on_what_you_use",
    sha256 = "1e287a7d094b7c3f29782d521130dfb4c1b1cd014e80c2eab24e597b9817e9ab",
    strip_prefix = "depend_on_what_you_use-0.9.0",
    url = "https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/releases/download/0.9.0/depend_on_what_you_use-0.9.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@depend_on_what_you_use//:setup_step_1.bzl", dwyu_setup_step_1 = "setup_step_1")
dwyu_setup_step_1()

load("@depend_on_what_you_use//:setup_step_2.bzl", dwyu_setup_step_2 = "setup_step_2")
dwyu_setup_step_2()
```

## Noteworthy Changes

- Improved performance while comparing include statements to headers provided by dependencies. Thanks to @arvid-norlander for this contribution! https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/352
- Allow disabling the preprocessor with a new aspect option `experimental_no_preprocessor`. While the preprocessor allows us to handle conditional includes and generally all sorts of preprocessor directives and macros, the implementation we use its quite slow. For projects without manipulation of include statements on preprocessor level this can significantly reduce the time required for the DWYU analysis (up to factor 100 in benchmarks) https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/359, https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/366

---

## What's Changed
* test(bcr): Fix presubmit tests Bazel versions by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/345
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.14.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/346
* chore(deps): update dependency python to 3.13 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/347
* doc: Fix link to implementation_deps details by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/349
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.15.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/354
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.11.9 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/355
* doc: Update contribution guidelines by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/357
* perf(aspect): Fix extreme bad complexity by @arvid-norlander in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/352
* test(aspect): Add benchmark for analyzing includes by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/358
* feat(aspect): Allow disabling the preprocessor by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/359
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.17.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/360
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook keith/pre-commit-buildifier to v8 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/361
* chore(deps): update dependency platforms to v1 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/363
* chore(deps): update dependency googletest to v1.17.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/364
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.11.12 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/365
* refactor: Use cc_* rules from rules_cc instead of native ones by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/362
* fix(aspect): Make the 'no_preprocessor' option experimental by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/366
* chore: Automatically update BCR fork during deployment by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/367
* docs: Add commit style to contribution guidelines and do a restructuring by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/368

## New Contributors
* @arvid-norlander made their first contribution in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/352

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/compare/0.8.0...0.9.0

## Using Bzlmod (Recommended)

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "depend_on_what_you_use", version = "0.8.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE (Legacy)

Add to your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "depend_on_what_you_use",
    sha256 = "2922f9b3a6435a14f4e05098e2324098acfb4f2da78d74f0a3e98543df241b16",
    strip_prefix = "depend_on_what_you_use-0.8.0",
    url = "https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/releases/download/0.8.0/depend_on_what_you_use-0.8.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@depend_on_what_you_use//:setup_step_1.bzl", dwyu_setup_step_1 = "setup_step_1")
dwyu_setup_step_1()

load("@depend_on_what_you_use//:setup_step_2.bzl", dwyu_setup_step_2 = "setup_step_2")
dwyu_setup_step_2()
```

## Noteworthy Changes

* fix(aspect): Ignore non C/CPP deps in target_mapping by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/343

---

## What's Changed
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook pre-commit/mirrors-mypy to v1.15.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/340
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.9.9 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/339
* fix(aspect): Ignore non cc deps in target_mapping by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/343
* test(aspect): Support and use more dynamic version specifiers by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/344


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/compare/0.7.0...0.8.0

## Using Bzlmod (Recommended)

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "depend_on_what_you_use", version = "0.7.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE (Legacy)

Add to your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "depend_on_what_you_use",
    sha256 = "73a0140316118d56bf05d435b48525ea0fcdd27972f5df459eae98e92fd82cc0",
    strip_prefix = "depend_on_what_you_use-0.7.0",
    url = "https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/releases/download/0.7.0/depend_on_what_you_use-0.7.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@depend_on_what_you_use//:setup_step_1.bzl", dwyu_setup_step_1 = "setup_step_1")
dwyu_setup_step_1()

load("@depend_on_what_you_use//:setup_step_2.bzl", dwyu_setup_step_2 = "setup_step_2")

```

## Noteworthy Changes

- Required minimum Bazel version increased to 6.4.0 @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/332
- Use dependencies compatible to all supported Bazel versions (6.4.0 to rolling) @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/332
- Ensure compatibility to Python 3.13 @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/338

---

## What's Changed
* docs: Fix typo by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/321
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.8.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/323
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook executablebooks/mdformat to v0.7.21 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/324
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook pre-commit/mirrors-mypy to v1.14.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/325
* test(bcr): Be compatible to environment without bazelisk by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/326
* test(aspect): Add test for providing defines via cxxopt by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/327
* chore: Introduce buildifier config file by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/328
* refactor(ci): Drop superfluous release step and ease BCR deployment by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/329
* chore: Add mypy badge by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/330
* Add tests focused on integration into workspaces by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/331
* Fix dependencies for all supported bazel versions by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/332
* Switch to bazel 8 by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/333
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook executablebooks/mdformat to v0.7.22 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/335
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.13.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/336
* test(apply_fixes): Test empty list attributes by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/337
* Update tested versions by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/338


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/compare/0.6.0...0.7.0

## Using Bzlmod (Recommended)

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "depend_on_what_you_use", version = "0.6.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE (Legacy)

⚠️ **This release is not compatible to Bazel >= 8.0.0 using the legacy WORKSPACE setup** ⚠️ 
The problem is that the `rules_cc` and `rules_pyhon` versions we reference in the `dwyu_setup_step_1` macro are not compatible to Bazel 8. It is planned to fix this in a later release. You might be able to circumvent this by enforcing newer versions of those rule sets in your workspace.

Add to your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "depend_on_what_you_use",
    sha256 = "2bde20cec993fad9f9989aaac06900188d9fcc9f23c1de3a5b326c0d31cc1457",
    strip_prefix = "depend_on_what_you_use-0.6.0",
    url = "https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/releases/download/0.6.0/depend_on_what_you_use-0.6.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@depend_on_what_you_use//:setup_step_1.bzl", dwyu_setup_step_1 = "setup_step_1")
dwyu_setup_step_1()

load("@depend_on_what_you_use//:setup_step_2.bzl", dwyu_setup_step_2 = "setup_step_2")
dwyu_setup_step_2()
```

## Breaking Changes

- **Dropped Support for Bazel 5**. Minimum Bazel version is now 6.0.0.

## Noteworthy Changes

- Build - Dropped Bazel 5.x support https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/309
- Fix (aspect) - Allow multiple dependencies providing the same header https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/292
- Fix (aspect) - Patch infinite recursion error in [pcpp](https://github.com/ned14/pcpp) (preprocessor used for parsing the code) https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/320
- Feature - Support `--noexperimental_python_import_all_repositories` https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/312
- Feature (aspect) - Support Bazel C++ toolchain feature `external_include_paths` https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/319
- Testing - Test environments are now: `ubuntu-24.04`, `macos-15` and `windows-2022` https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/307



---

## What's Changed
* refactor: Streamline release process by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/290
* Increase used and tested Bazel version by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/291
* fix(aspect): Allow multiple dependencies providing the same header by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/292
* refactor(aspect): Only use a param file if required by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/294
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.6.8 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/295
* chore(deps): update bazel dependencies by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/296
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook executablebooks/mdformat to v0.7.18 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/298
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.9.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/297
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook pre-commit/mirrors-mypy to v1.13.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/305
* chore: Update CI test environment by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/307
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook executablebooks/mdformat to v0.7.19 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/303
* Cleanup unused things by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/308
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.8.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/304
* build: Drop Bazel 5.x support by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/309
* Streamline and harden test setup by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/311
* Use modern language rules load statements by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/310
* feat: Support --noexperimental_python_import_all_repositories by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/312
* Refactor auto deps update by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/313
* Streamline renovate behavior and config by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/314
* chore(deps): update dependency stardoc to v0.7.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/315
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.10.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/316
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.8.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/317
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook pre-commit/pre-commit-hooks to v5 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/318
* feat(aspect): support toolchain feature external_include_paths by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/319
* fix(aspect): Patch RecursionError in pcpp by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/320


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/compare/0.5.0...0.6.0

## Using Bzlmod (Recommended)

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "depend_on_what_you_use", version = "0.5.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE (Legacy)

Add to your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "depend_on_what_you_use",
    sha256 = "39b106030a9e79db2fb52dca1b66fec7618d93e0dff986ee55f3b176fd979c91",
    strip_prefix = "depend_on_what_you_use-0.5.0",
    url = "https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/releases/download/0.5.0/depend_on_what_you_use-0.5.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@depend_on_what_you_use//:setup_step_1.bzl", dwyu_setup_step_1 = "setup_step_1")
dwyu_setup_step_1()

load("@depend_on_what_you_use//:setup_step_2.bzl", dwyu_setup_step_2 = "setup_step_2")
dwyu_setup_step_2()
```

## Noteworthy Changes

* Documentation - There is now a single source of truth for the aspect documentation. You find it in [docs/dwyu_aspect.md](https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/blob/main/docs/dwyu_aspect.md) https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/273
* Bugfix (automatic fixes) - Fix bug regarding automatic fixes failing while analyzing targets with empty hdrs attribute  https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/280
* Feature (aspect) - Experimental support for setting the `__cplusplus` macro to enable correctly processing files with preprocessor statements relying on this macro  https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/288
* Feature (aspect) - Support processing targets with large attributes which otherwise would fail due to the system's command length limit https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/283

---

## What's Changed
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.7.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/263
* Update quality tools by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/265
* Update Ubuntu in BCR tests by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/267
* Reduce Windows Python overhead by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/266
* Stop bundling renovate quality updates by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/268
* Update tested bazel versions by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/269
* Replace Bazel mypy orchestration with pre-commit by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/271
* Remove superfluous export by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/272
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.5.5 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/274
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook pre-commit/mirrors-mypy to v1.11.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/275
* chore(deps): update dependency pre-commit to v3.8.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/276
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook keith/pre-commit-buildifier to v7 by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/278
* Use stardoc to generate some docs by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/273
* Work around missing "stringListValue" in certain cases by @mrkkrp in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/280
* chore: Update pre-commit to 3.8.0 by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/281
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook astral-sh/ruff-pre-commit to v0.6.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/286
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook pre-commit/mirrors-mypy to v1.11.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/284
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook keith/pre-commit-buildifier to v7.3.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/287
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.8.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/285
* Experimental support for setting the '__cplusplus' macro by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/288
* Use param files to invoke process_target.py by @mrkkrp in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/283

## New Contributors
* @mrkkrp made their first contribution in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/280

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/compare/0.4.0...0.5.0

## Noteworthy Changes

- Added missing headers to default std headers list https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/262

---

## What's Changed
* Extend central registry testing to rolling releases by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/256
* Actions should offer a proper mnemonic by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/257
* chore(deps): update quality tooling dependencies by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/258
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.7.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/259
* Refactor integration testing by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/260
* Fix standard headers list by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/262


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/compare/0.3.0...0.4.0


## Using WORKSPACE (Legacy)

Add to your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "depend_on_what_you_use",
    sha256 = "b56cdfaed0d74967fefb54bdd3f05bd167c4c4ebaa2a67af962d969e6a51962b",
    strip_prefix = "depend_on_what_you_use-0.3.0",
    url = "https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/releases/download/0.3.0/depend_on_what_you_use-0.3.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@depend_on_what_you_use//:setup_step_1.bzl", dwyu_setup_step_1 = "setup_step_1")
dwyu_setup_step_1()

load("@depend_on_what_you_use//:setup_step_2.bzl", dwyu_setup_step_2 = "setup_step_2")
dwyu_setup_step_2()
```

## Breaking Changes

- Automatic fixes: Change how arguments are forwarded to buildozer. This is done to achieve a consistent API to how arguments are forwarded to the bazel commands. https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/251

## Noteworthy Changes

- Analysis: Update standard library headers which are ignored by DWYU https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/248
- Automatic fixes: Support `cquery` to find missing dependencies. Also we allow  now forwarding arguments to the bazel commands which are executed by the apply_fixes script https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/249, https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/252
- Analysis: Fix bug for analyzing implementation_deps when using target mappings https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/254
- Automatic fiixes: Add a new method for discovering DWYU report files which should be more efficient for large workspaces. This is based on creating an execution log for the analysis done by the DWYU aspect and then forwarding this log to the apply_fixes script https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/255

---

## What's Changed
* chore(deps): update quality tooling dependencies by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/244
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.6.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/243
* Remove stray "is" by @steple in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/247
* Update standard headers by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/248
* apply_fixes: Support cquery and custom bazel arguments by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/249
* Minor quality of life by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/250
* Apply_fixes: Consistent CLI by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/251
* apply_fixes: More flexible bazel-info usage by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/252
* Fix target_mapping not working with implementation_deps by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/254
* apply_fixes can parse report files from a DWYU execution log by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/255

## New Contributors
* @steple made their first contribution in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/247

:tada:  This release is a major milestone for DWYU :tada:

This is the first release without a leading 0.0. While DWYU is not yet ready for 1.0.0, its overall feature set is now mostly stable. No bug reports with major gaps in functionality have been reported and thus we are confident to leave the "_beta testing_" phase.

This is also the first release supporting [bzlmod](https://bazel.build/external/overview#bzlmod). Also we added [examples](https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/tree/main/examples) demonstrating DWYU usage.

Please note this release has some breaking changes as defined below.

## Using Bzlmod (Recommended)

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "depend_on_what_you_use", version = "0.1.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE (Legacy)

Add to your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "depend_on_what_you_use",
    sha256 = "746de76cb6a8d5e0d6e60c91bcc73ffd6088fff4152552c3e0aee6219c1d809d",
    strip_prefix = "depend_on_what_you_use-0.1.0",
    url = "https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/releases/download/0.1.0/depend_on_what_you_use-0.1.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@depend_on_what_you_use//:setup_step_1.bzl", dwyu_setup_step_1 = "setup_step_1")
dwyu_setup_step_1()

load("@depend_on_what_you_use//:setup_step_2.bzl", dwyu_setup_step_2 = "setup_step_2")
dwyu_setup_step_2()
```

## Breaking Changes

- The **minimum Bazel version is now 5.4.0**
- The output group has been renamed.  Replace `--output_groups=cc_dwyu_output` with `--output_groups=dwyu` in your DWYU commands https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/170
- The name for the DWYU aspect option to provide a config file for ignored include paths changed from `config = "//<your_config_file>.json"` to `ignored_includes = "//<your_config_file>.json"` https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/181
- Renamed the `--bazel-bin` apply_fixes CLI option to `--search-path` to make it more obvious how flexibly it can be used https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/221

## Noteworthy Changes

- Windows and macOS are now explicitly tested in the CI to ensure DWYU behaves on those platforms as expected.
- You can now specify a custom list of tags to make DWYU skip analyzing targets https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/159
- Support depending on DWYU via bzlmod
- Ensure code quality with [ruff](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff) (most checks are active)
- There is now a set of [examples](https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/tree/main/examples)
- Add verbosity option to the aspect https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/209

---

## Noteworthy Changes

* Make project compatible to Python 3.10 by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/111
* Restructure dependency management by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/112
* Use pcpp to parse C/C++ source code by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/115
* Add basic support for processing preprocessor defines by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/118


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/compare/0.0.8...0.0.9

Put the following into your `WORKSPACE` file:
```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

    name = "depend_on_what_you_use",
```

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/compare/0.0.7...0.0.8

## Breaking Changes

* Use `re.match(pattern, include)` for ignored include patterns by @storypku in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/77
* Naming: change all uses of "deps_info" to "headers_info" by @storypku in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/90


## Noteworthy Changes

* Unified target label naming for DWYU-generated files by @storypku in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/78
* analyze_includes: add __repr__ method for some classes to help debugging by @storypku in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/82
* Support more cases of commented code  by @storypku in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/87
* Ensure implementation deps is only used on cc library by @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/94
* Handle the case where neither public-files nor private-files are present by @storypku in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/96
* Improve support for resolving relative include statements @martis42 in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/97 and https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/98

</br>

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/compare/0.0.5...0.0.6

Put the following into your `WORKSPACE` file: ```python load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive") http_archive( name = "depend_on_what_you_use", sha256 = "787df8d7156d5cce3e66fee1b7c68474218bf8658ccca74851c5b1c50e76bd14", strip_prefix = "depend_on_what_you_use-0.0.5", url = "https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/archive/refs/tags/0.0.5.tar.gz", ) load("@depend_on_what_you_use//:dependencies.bzl", dwyu_dependencies = "public_dependencies") dwyu_dependencies() ``` ## Breaking Changes * Changing format of report files to prepare for more automatic fixing features in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/65 * Changing aspect config files for configuring to be ignored include paths https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/67 * There are now separate fields for to be ignored include paths and to be ignored patterns * Config entries are optional * An empty `ignore_include_paths` entry will disable ignoring standard library headers ## Noteworthy Changes * Fixing a bug for excluding include paths from the DWYU analysis https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/67
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/compare/0.0.4...0.0.5

Put the following into your `WORKSPACE` file: ```python load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive") http_archive( name = "depend_on_what_you_use", sha256 = "7ab6b0429d569e236b37bf2f7b8baddd574a06f685e5bcdf438cac28f95c9316", strip_prefix = "depend_on_what_you_use-0.0.4", url = "https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/archive/refs/tags/0.0.4.tar.gz", ) load("@depend_on_what_you_use//:dependencies.bzl", dwyu_dependencies = "public_dependencies") dwyu_dependencies() ``` ## Breaking Changes * Changing format of report files to facilitate automatic fixing in https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/58 ## Noteworthy Changes * Automatix fixing supports private deps https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/58 * Provide automatic fix for public deps which should be private https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/59 * Automatic Fixing: Allow setting custom arguments for buildozer https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/60
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/compare/0.0.3...0.0.4

## Breaking Changes
Drop support for `interface_deps`. This feature has been [removed again from Bazel 6](https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/14950). https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/55.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/compare/0.0.2...0.0.3

Put the following into your `WORKSPACE` file:
```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "depend_on_what_you_use",
    sha256 = "81c990e1d3722e20842e203e0c9da99e25993563f025897dda900561564b91b7",
    strip_prefix = "depend_on_what_you_use-0.0.2",
    url = "https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/archive/refs/tags/0.0.2.tar.gz",
)

load("@depend_on_what_you_use//:dependencies.bzl", dwyu_dependencies = "public_dependencies")

dwyu_dependencies()
```

## What's Changed

### Noteworthy Changes
- Support checking Bazel 6 interface deps  https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/37
- Fix bug in json report file generation  https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/41
- Define the minimum Python version as 3.6  https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/43
- Allow ignoring include statements with regex patterns  https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/50
- Apply fixes warns if a fix could not be performed and provides hints about possible problems  https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/51

### Breaking Changes
New CLI interface for the apply_fixes script https://github.com/martis42/depend_on_what_you_use/pull/47
- Automatically detect the workspace root if no workspace is specified
- Allow using the convenience symlinks to find the bazel-bin dir. This is now the default behavior. Utilizing `bazel info` comand to find the bazel-bin directory can be chosen via an opt-in.
- If using `bazel info` to to discover the bazel-bin directory, one can choose the compilation mode.
- Allow providing the bazel-bin directory directly
- Fail if no DWYU report files can be discovered
